name: Pokkén Tournament: Update Ver.A14
summary: Version A14 is an update for the arcade version of Pokkén Tournament released on July 20th, 2016. It added four new characters and made balance changes to bring the game in line with the Wii U version as of Version 1.3, as well as including Reshiram and Cresselia as support Pokémon, adding Mission Panel mode, and expanding the Tutorial mode.
